title: Valkyrie Drive -Bhikkhuni-
notes: Before going into story mode, you must visit the cafeteria first. Otherwise the game will hang at a black screen with high CPU. This means you can't start a brand new game on Linux because you don't start out with the cafeteria. Once you're in story mode everything works fine.

gpu: X.Org AMD Radeon (TM) RX 480 Graphics (POLARIS10, DRM 3.26.0 AMD 18.30 , 4.15.0-34-generic, LLVM 6.0.1)
notes: runs using "PROTON_USE_WINED3D11=1 %command%" in launch options but controller is really bugged, plays fine with mouse and keyboard though
title: VALKYRIE DRIVE -BHIKKHUNI-
